      • placeCart

        public static EntityMinecart placeCart(java.lang.String owner,
                       ItemStack cart,
                       World world,
                       int i,
                       int j,
                       int k)
        Spawns a new cart entity using the provided item. The backing item must implement IMinecartItem and/or extend ItemMinecart. Generally Forge requires all cart items to extend ItemMinecart.
        Parameters:
        owner - The player name that should used as the owner
        cart - An ItemStack containing a cart item, will not be changed by the function
        world - The World object
        i - x-Coord
        j - y-Coord
        k - z-Coord
        Returns:
        the cart placed or null if failed
        See Also:
        IMinecartItem, ItemMinecart

      • getCartSpeedUncapped

        public static double getCartSpeedUncapped(EntityMinecart cart)
        Returns the cart's "speed". It is not capped by the carts max speed, it instead returns the cart's "potential" speed. Used by collision and linkage logic. Do not use this to determine how fast a cart is currently moving.
        Parameters:
        cart -
        Returns:
        speed
